name: Dyes : Yellow
text: Our House is coming along so nicely! /nWe should provide the trees with the correct colors, don't you think? /nOtherwise its going to be a boring and gray world and we see /nplenty of that during the winter. /nDarling, could you g&grab some y&yellow g&dye /n to add to our g&fabulous color g&pallet?
